items.sentence: There was no one in the room besides Tom and Mary.
There was some fifties music playing on the radio.
There were a lot of things Tom had to say to Mary.
There were as many as five hundred people present.
There were many presents under the Christmas tree.
I don\'t think Tom is going to be here until 2:30.
I don\'t think Tom knows when Mary came to Boston.
I don\'t think Tom knows where the post office is.
I don\'t think Tom likes you the way you like him.
I don\'t think Tom plays the oboe as well as Mary.
Tom went to Boston and stayed there until he died.
Tom went to the drugstore to buy some cough syrup.
Tom will have plenty of time to do that next week.
Tom will leave the company at the end of the year.
Let\'s list all the reasons we shouldn\'t do that.
Let\'s talk quietly so we don\'t wake the baby up.
Tom says we can park on either side of the street.
Tom skipped dinner saying he was too tired to eat.
Tom thinks women in America wear too much perfume.
Tom turned on the small lamp on his bedside table.
